name: Gmail Redesign
description:
Hi !

Welcome to Gmail Redesign. I redesigned Gmail with an idea of keeping it as simple and elegant as possible. Simple, Sleek yet functional - Enjoy this redesign of Gmail.


How to interact

  1. Press 'P' to see a preview mail ('P' to close it again)
  2. You can click on compose and the first chat
  3. Click on the more icon on the side menu to see more options

Feedback is appreciated. Please show your support by liking and following ðŸ˜€
